work.description: Here's a summary of my work experience so far.

experiences.name: Ingresso.com
experiences.description: Ingresso.com is a pioneering ticket sales platform in Brazil, offering a wide range of tickets for events, cinemas and shows. Since 2020, I have acted as a technical reference for front-end developers, leading the implementation of new features, ensuring the maintenance and optimization of website performance, and promoting the adoption of best practices in web development. My role includes technical coordination of highly complex projects, mentoring new talent and working closely with UX/UI teams to ensure the best possible user experience.
list: Implementation of a new ticket purchase flow for Rock in Rio 2022, migrating the legacy project made in angular.js to a more current stack using React, Next.js, Typescript and react-hook-form
Development of the company's product discovery, made with React, Next.js, Typescript, React-Query, Storybook, zod and react-hook-form
Carrying out automated tests with Jest and Playwright, error monitoring with Sentry, quality assurance with SonarQube and CI/CD implementation with Github Actions
